lick.name: Lick
lick.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

confuse_ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse_ray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

night_shade.name: Night Shade
night_shade.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.
effects: deals damage equal to user's level
